title: Enable workload resolver in bootstrap MSBuild
body:
context: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/6552#issuecomment-861053226

We're disabling the workload resolver in the bootstrap MSBuild. It's not needed to build MSBuild itself, but it will be nice to have in future scenarios when using the just-built MSBuild to build other projects. We should turn it back on.

One possibility: don't use this convoluted bootstrap approach and instead formalize creating a private SDK with an unzipped SDK + our new binaries copied in. But I'm not tied to that.
